data.text:
Thanks to the efforts of our team members and the trust of our customers, we have transported 2 thousand tons of medical supplies. We have flown 140 flights from China to 14 countries, including Mexico. 
Together we continue to fly higher. #MexicosGlobalWings https://t.co/oWnQMp1C3g

Your safety is our top priority. We‘ve aligned our safety protocols with our suppliers and authorities to ensure your safety. Learn more about our Health and Sanitization Management System here: https://t.co/wcJ0KL0ecn https://t.co/Wa8Che0ef1
Let Mexico City be your gateway to the Peninsula of Yucatan. Catch a flight from Houston and visit this Mexican paradise. https://t.co/KFfl0G98kS

data.text: Souvenirs are a small memento that our loved ones bring back for us during travels. Join our #AMSouvenirChallenge and share your favorite souvenir, and tag the person who gave it to you! https://t.co/ybxUwpBRIH

Please remember that the use of face masks is mandatory on all our flights.
https://t.co/3tPkpY80Vs https://t.co/THCF3dLlwg
The definition of heaven on earth. https://t.co/u07y9sxZKb

@JSYML Muchas gracias por tus comentarios, ten por seguro que van a ser compartidos con la gerencia correspondiente. Nos esforzamos día a día para dar el mejor servicio a cada unos de nuestros clientes. ✈️MA*
The best destination is a sustainable future. This #WorldEnvironmentDay, we’d like to share some of the actions we took in 2019 to take care of our planet. https://t.co/eAUww1mQ1W

Your safety is our top priority. Medical evaluations for all our crew members and airport staff are an essential part of our new Health and Sanitization Management System. Learn more: https://t.co/bbvzeQLwSQ https://t.co/4sqVhmXbXD
@RonCo2112 For tickets purchased before and during the current contingency, we share the link with the applicable policies  https://t.co/5l2rLFKeKX   IF

Book confidently knowing that the first change to your flight is free of charge.
https://t.co/2Q1LeVEdv4 https://t.co/9zn1aSq2Ff

data.text: @gingerspice082 In the face of global contingency caused by covid19, we are leaving tickets open and valid for 1 year. That is, you can use the full value of the ticket for the next trip, on the route, class and date you want. *HS

The San Martin Plaza in Lima is a sight for sore eyes. 
https://t.co/o5xZZEsVrE https://t.co/ICWj1s1i15

For the first time in Mexican aviation history, an aircraft departing from Mexico has landed in Shenzhen. Our B787 flew the 100th mission flight between Mexico and China. We are proud to be reaching new heights and continue to be #MexicosGlobalWings. https://t.co/xMZzzukO3E

data.text:
This #WorldHandHygieneDay, take care of yourself so you can take care of the ones you love most.
Here are some of our recommendations to stay safe during this outbreak: https://t.co/uS8rf8Hp5n
@Keagan_News Hi Keagan, the response time is from 5 to 10 business days. We will contact you through email. Please share with us your case number through a DM. *DR  https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F
#MayThe4thBeWithYou #StarWarsDay https://t.co/sc2nZGuu2X

data.text: @ha_LOOSH_ki Hi. Please share your reservation code with Dm. * YM
@Jesiker13 Jessica, please share your reservation code by DM. * YM
@sga2008 Sandra, our classic fare includes a 25kg checked bag, in hand you are allowed 2 pieces (personal bag and carry-on bag), which together do not weigh more than 10 kg. IF
@Keagan_News Please send your request to the following email: amcomplaint@aeromexico.com, we will follow up and give you a formal response. I F
@arsduo Hello, in this case it would be only for one way trip. *HS
@thekrzi We apologize for the inconvenience; please share with us your reservation code through a DM to take a look. KG
@LeaaEnciso Lea, for changes in your reservation it is important to contact our call center 1800 237 6639, this via it is not possible to make charges if there is any difference. IF
@perfectquarters Jacqueline, please send your request to the following email amcomplaint@aeromexico.com, we will analyze your case and we will give you an answer. IF

@perfectquarters Jacqueline, due to the current contingency, your ticket remain open with a validity of 1 year from the date of issue, the exchange charges will be exempt, please confirm if we leave your ticket open. IF
@bubblegumps @bubblegumps, Please tell us, How can we assist you? ST

We know that some trips can’t wait. Please make sure to check our new itinerary for May, keep up to date with the routes that we are reopening, and our frequency increases, so that you can be with those you love most. https://t.co/IzrUeGMzIW https://t.co/IQIfJAMAmf

We are committed to supporting our community. Coordinated by the @SRE_mx, flight #AM9835 landed in Mexico City today. This is the first time one of our aircraft transported cargo onboard the passenger cabin as well as the baggage compartment. #WeContinueFlyingTogether https://t.co/FI1kg0hE0x

data.text: @Jlee3794 Jennifer, please through DM share with us your reservation code. We are going to verify your situation. *HS
@_omgrach I offer you a sincere apology for the confusion with your name. We remain attentive to the information. IF
@_omgrach Omar, please send your request to the following email amcomplaint@aeromexico.com, it will be analyzed and we will give you an answer. IF

@_omgrach We are very sorry for the inconvenience that this situation has caused, your ticket will be open for 1 year from the date of issue, you can use it on the same route or the one you choose. IF

@_omgrach We regret the inconvenience. It is not possible to proceed with a monetary refund due the travel restrictions are totally out of airline´s hands and they are causes not attributable to Aeroméxico. We hope you can understand us and we appreciate your understanding. *DD

Hey @Delta, @airfrance, & @KLM— In times like these, we know that our strength lies in supporting each other. We want to show everyone that we're in this together, so post a picture of your planes to go along with our 787-9 Dreamliner! #WeAreAviation https://t.co/gxo0MEEMhd

data.text:
Our Boeing 787-8 “Peace Missionary” left for Shanghai today. With the help of @SRE_mx, this Aeromexico Cargo flight will bring back medical equipment to Mexico acquired by the Mexican government. 
Thank you to our team members who lift us up so that we can keep flying higher. https://t.co/y6kjFJYoqi

data.text: @TheMrMario Por favor, compártenos tu clave de reserva (6 letras solamente) y número de boleto mismo inicia 139, así como el correo que asociaste a la misma. Quedamos a tus órdenes. ST

@TheMrMario Aeromexico se apega a las disposiciones emitidas por los países y cierres de fronteras es por ello que desafortunadamente las cancelaciones en este período son por razones no atribuibles a la aerolínea...2/2 ST

@TheMrMario @TheMrMario, comprendemos la molestia y preocupación ante esta contingencia por lo todas nuestras vías de atención se encuentran saturadas, te aseguramos que estamos trabajando en ofrecer la asistencia a cada uno de nuestros pasajeros y sus requerimientos ...1/2 ST

@N48260756 Gigi, Let us inform you that we can leave your tickets open for rescheduling and travel before February 28th, change fees and penalties will be waived, however, if there is a fare difference it must be covered. Do you want us to do this? ST

If you still don't know what to do with your free time, why not start planning your summer getaway? 
https://t.co/0tWnl0ZkPd https://t.co/GOqT5ojM8D

Reply with a GIF and tell us the first place you're going the next time you travel! 
https://t.co/0tWnl0ZkPd https://t.co/VeCc0uhzXO

@erickfmorales Te ofrecemos una cordial disculpa por el tiempo de espera, estamos experimentando un alto volumen de llamadas y mensajes, por favor si aún necesitas ayuda háznoslo saber contándonos cómo podemos apoyarte. Comparte tu clave de reservación por DM. DD

Our Special Flight Sale is here to make your wanderlust dreams come true. 
https://t.co/0tWnl0ZkPd https://t.co/t0y6wgNYaU
